message: Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation! You must complete your attendance verification to receive CLE credit. As a reminder, if you have a free Justia Connect membership, you must upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to receive CLE credit.
The steps below must be completed by 2:00 p.m. PT on Sunday, March 10, 2024, to receive credit.
number-list: Input the attendance verification code received during your presentation.
Follow the remaining prompts in the form to input all pertinent information and offer evaluation of the CLE presentation.
Download your certificate, and you’re done!
message2: If you have any questions about verification, please contact Justia Support.

message: Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation, Free Law: Resources, Technology & Legal Issues. We love connecting our members with new learning opportunities and hope you found the webinar both engaging and informative.
As we continue to plan future Justia Webinars for Justia Connect members, we want to hear from you! If you have not already done so, please share your feedback about your recent webinar experience.
Do you have an idea for a future speaker or topic? Let us know!

Looking for 3 hours of CLE credit AND to advance your knowledge in emerging legal technologies in a snap? You’ve come to the right place. Join us for three legal technology webinars in May & June of 2024 with guest speakers Salar Atrizadeh, Thomas Shack, and Mathew Kerbis to advance your knowledge on a myriad of legal technology topics.
bullet-list: Attorneys’ Duties Towards Clients When Using Technology
How AI Impacts Small & Solo Firms: Exploring the Potential Benefits & Risks of Incorporating AI Into Practice
From Billable Hours to Sustainable Income: The Power of Subscription Models + AI
message2: Whether you’re a tech savvy lawyer looking to get an edge, or a technology novice looking for additional guidance, our guest speakers’ expertise will leave you feeling empowered.
bottomline: Sign Up for Our Exclusive Legal Tech Triple Feature Today!!

button.text: Register Now for All Three Webinars!

message3: Please visit individual webinar pages for more information about CLE accreditation.
If you want to earn CLE credit for your attendance at these webinars, you will need to upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to take advantage of this exclusive benefit.
